import { React, useState } from 'react' import AddToBasket from './AddToBasket' import AddToWatchList from './AddToWatchList' const WatchList = ({oneItem, setOneItem}) => { return (
{oneItem.img == undefined ? '' : oneItem.img.map(e=> )}

{oneItem.title}

{oneItem.type}
{oneItem.price}
) } export default WatchList
